moves.1. d3: I imagine all of us had that draw that sprouted from a lost position. Given the fact that my opponent lost a win, I want to see other peoples' comments on what the given endgame.
I thought c4 was a little too symmetrical, if black were to recapture with 6...dc4
moves.6... O-O 7. c4 c6 8. Bg5 Bxb2 9. Qb3 Bxa: gameknot's engine gives this move as a mistake
moves.35... Nxc6 36. Bc8 Nb8 37. Bb7 d4 38. Kf: for obvious reasons I cannot take the knight as my opponent would definitely win, because it would transpose into a won endgame for Black
moves.41. Kd3 Nxe5+ 42. Kxd4 Nc6+ 43. Kc5 Nxa5: this was my plan: to feign an attack on his pawn.
moves.47... b4:
it worked
crazy as it seems what one move can do
I believe this moved led me to eventually draw the game.
moves.48. Kc5 b3 49. Kb4 b2 50. Bg6 Nc6+ 51. K: I don't know if was important to dodge Black's check move. But to error on the right then to error wrong
